data.title: Registration starts this May 10th
data.meta_description: News website - Registration starts this May 10th
data.text:
Within the programme for the new academic period of the UTEQ is the registration schedule for students of the different degree courses and levels.

From the 10th to the 15th of May the Academic Management System (SGA) will be available for ordinary enrolments; from the 16th to the 22nd of May extraordinary enrolments; and from the 23rd to the 29th of May special enrolments. These dates have been established by the Academic Council of the UTEQ, therefore, the student must agree to enrol on the dates already presented. On the other hand, once the ordinary and extraordinary enrolment stage is concluded, according to the academic calendar, classes will start on 24 May 2022.
